title: Beginners please
creator_credit: Colin Ballantyne and South Australian Housing Trust
brief_description: A brief survey of Elizabeth, South Australia focusing on the history of the building of the twin theatres, the Octagon (an eight-sided structure) and the Shedley (smaller and more intimate).
